name: Song (Harder You Fools)
description:
A short experimental music game - move around the hall to hear the song from different perspectives. Headphones strongly recommended.

Use WASD to move, the mouse to look around and ESC to toggle the options screen (where you can quit the game).

The song lasts for around eight minutes - there's no end/win state and you can quit anytime. Listen to the music for as long as you like then leave - that's it!
